Description: Painted pottery shabti of Ğd-m3ʿt-iw:s-ʿnḫ with black detail: a lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a summarily modelled face with traced eyes and crossed arms in relief holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted hieroglyphs; the concave back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
